medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The pain started at 4:30 am, waking her from sleep and progressively worsened over the past 10 days. It became unbearable, prompting the visit to the ED. The patient also reports experiencing nausea and chills.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Celiac disease; history of appendicitis and right knee arthroscopy, left thumb repair.
